Simon Ekpa (amụrụ na Maachị 21, 1985) bụ onye ọkaiwu Naijiria-Finnish, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye bụbu onye na-eme egwuregwu
Amara ya nke ọma maka ịgbasa akụkọ adịgboroja na ebubo na ọ na-akpalite ọgbaghara na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria. Nke sitere na Ohaukwu, Ȯra Ebonyi, Ekpa biri na Lahti, Finland kemgbe afo 2007.
Finnish police detain Biafran separatist leader Simon Ekpa]
